Kinopio Blog

Bulletin № 27

Bulletin

Jan 30, 2023

Hi friends,

It's been a while since I've sent one of these bulletins out, looking back over this very long list of changes it feels like I built a whole other app in that time.

But there's a flip side of this all progress, there are tons of people who would really enjoy using Kinopio to solve problems and sort out their thoughts – but they've never even heard of it because I've mostly been coding.

To help with that, I've brought on Ola part-time to grow awareness. If you see her in the Discord (as @kohola) do be sure to say hi!

What's New

  • Space Stats, for the curious at heart
  • Optimized Performance so that loading, scrolling, and editing cards in your spaces is now ~25% faster
  • Straight Connection Lines helpful for diagrams and more technical ideas
  • Resize Youtube Videos
  • Create Boxes around Cards to quickly create structure around ideas
  • Hover Glow highlights connected cards on hover
  • Positional Zoom improves space zooming on desktop (and replaces minimaps)
  • Presentation Mode hides the UI to put the focus solely on your content
  • Color Swatch Cards is helpful for moodboards
  • Inbox Cards List makes it easy to move cards from Inbox to your current Space
  • Z-Toggle Zoom Out for quickly peeking out and in on a space
  • Box Snapping. Drag boxes close to each other to snap them together
  • Raycast Extension. Quickly capture ideas to your inbox with the Kinopio extension for Raycast on macOS
  • Pen Pals Frame. The perfect frame for your missives and manifestos
  • Dark Mode. Whether you're a night owl or into the mysterious and cool, dark mode is here for you
  • Streamlined Background. The UI for changing space backgrounds has been streamlined to be more direct and intuitive to use
  • Kinopio on Mastodon. To help everyone moving on from Twitter, I cross-post all @kinopio content to Mastodon now

Contact Support
